title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it doesn't hide the item as expected.
OB: Observed Behavior: The label is still visible in the PDF preview.
EB: Expected Behavior: The label should disappear from the PDF preview.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the 'Properties' view for the label.
3. Set the 'Display' property to 'none'.
4. Preview the document in the PDF emitter.
